specifications.Care Advice: Knit When you receive a knit product, it may be stiff and wrinkled. This is because the fabric has been folded and compressed for shipping. To soften and straighten the fabric, you should condition it for 2-3 days at room temperature before using it. Regenerated > Modal This fabric can shrink or become distorted if it get wet. Store it in a cool, dry, well-ventilated location. Natural > Silk Silk can be damaged by sweat and other acidic substances. It may also fade if left in the sun for too long. Store it in a place without direct sunlight.
specifications.Care Instructions: Dry clean only Recommended Use T-shirts
